entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
